verses.verse: Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> the <S%H9307>cupbearer<s%> and the <S%H644>baker<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H2398>offended<s%> their <S%H113>lord,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H7107>furious<s%> with his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5631>officials,<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H9307>cupbearer<s%> and the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker.<s%>

So he <S%H5414>put<s%> them in <S%H4929>confinement<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>bodyguard,<s%> in the <S%H1004>jail,<s%> <S%H5470><s%> the [same] <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H631>imprisoned.<s%>

And the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>bodyguard<s%> <S%H6485>put<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> in <S%H6485>charge<s%> of them, and he <S%H8334>took<s%> <S%H8334>care<s%> of them; and they were in <S%H4929>confinement<s%> for <S%H3117>some<s%> <S%H3117>time.<s%>

Then the <S%H9307>cupbearer<s%> and the <S%H644>baker<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H631>confined<s%> in <S%H1004>jail,<s%> <S%H5470><s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H2492>had<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> with his [own] <S%H2472>dream<s%> [and] <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H2472>dream<s%> with its [own] <S%H6623>interpretation.<s%>
When <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to them in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H7200>observed<s%> them, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they were <S%H2196>dejected.<s%>

And he <S%H7592>asked<s%> Pharaoh's <S%H5631>officials<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were with him in <S%H4929>confinement<s%> in his master's <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H4069>"Why<s%> are your <S%H6440>faces<s%> so <S%H7451>sad<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%>?"

Then they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "We have <S%H2492>had<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H6622>interpret<s%> it." Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Do not <S%H6623>interpretations<s%> belong to <S%H430>God<s%>? <S%H5608>Tell<s%> [it] to me, <S%H4994>please.<s%>"

So the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H9307>cupbearer<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> his <S%H2472>dream<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "In my <S%H2472>dream,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [there was] a <S%H1612>vine<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of me;

and on the <S%H1612>vine<s%> [were] <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8299>branches.<s%> And as it was <S%H6524>budding,<s%> its <S%H9340>blossoms<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> out, [and] its <S%H811>clusters<s%> <S%H1310>produced<s%> <S%H1310>ripe<s%> <S%H6025>grapes.<s%>

"Now Pharaoh's <S%H3563>cup<s%> was in my <S%H3027>hand;<s%> so I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6025>grapes<s%> and <S%H7818>squeezed<s%> them into Pharaoh's <S%H3563>cup,<s%> and I <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> into Pharaoh's <S%H3709>hand.<s%>"
Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> of it: the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8299>branches<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%>

within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H7725>restore<s%> you to your <S%H3653>office;<s%> and you will <S%H5414>put<s%> Pharaoh's <S%H3563>cup<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%> according to your <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4941>custom<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> you were his <S%H9307>cupbearer.<s%>

<S%H3588>"Only<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H2142>keep<s%> me in mind <S%H9201>when<s%> it <S%H3190>goes<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> with you, and <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> me a <S%H2617>kindness<s%> by <S%H2142>mentioning<s%> me to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H3318>get<s%> me out of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

"For I was in <S%H1589>fact<s%> <S%H1589>kidnapped<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> and <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> that they should have <S%H7760>put<s%> me into the <S%H953>dungeon.<s%>"

When the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he had <S%H6622>interpreted<s%> <S%H2896>favorably,<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "I <S%H637>also<s%> [saw] in my <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [there were] <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5536>baskets<s%> of <S%H2751>white<s%> <S%H2751>bread<s%> on my <S%H7218>head;<s%>

and in the <S%H5945>top<s%> <S%H5536>basket<s%> [there were] <S%H4480>some<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> sorts of <S%H644>baked<s%> <S%H3978>food<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> were <S%H398>eating<s%> them out of the <S%H5536>basket<s%> on my <S%H7218>head.<s%> "

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is its <S%H6623>interpretation:<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5536>baskets<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%>

within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H7218>head<s%> from you and will <S%H8518>hang<s%> you on a <S%H6086>tree;<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> will <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you. "

Thus it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> [which was] Pharaoh's <S%H3205>birthday,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> that he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and he <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H9307>cupbearer<s%> and the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
And he <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H9307>cupbearer<s%> to his <S%H4945>office,<s%> and he <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> into Pharaoh's <S%H3709>hand;<s%>
but he <S%H8518>hanged<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H6622>interpreted<s%> to them.
Yet the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H9307>cupbearer<s%> did not <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> but <S%H7911>forgot<s%> him.
